data.title: Eternal Youth CD
data.meta_description: Eternal Youth is the first compilation album by Rolo Tomassi. The first of these two CDs showcases their material from split extended plays and EPs, while the second disc is composed of early demos, remixes and acoustic tracks.   Disc One No. Title Length 1. "Mount Celestia" (from a 2009 Hassle Records 7") 7:18 2. "Tit
